thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Baseball’s Newest Tactic: Trying to Win

author: Jared Diamond
title: Baseball’s Newest Tactic: Trying to Win
text:
In the wake of their worst season in more than three decades, the San Francisco Giants made a radical decision this winter: They tried to get better. Not in five years. Not in three years. Right now—investing nearly $120 million in their roster in a bid to return to the playoffs.
“It went against the grain,” newly acquired outfielder Andrew McCutchen said.
Welcome...
